description: Erection of single storey rear extension (5m in depth, maximum height of 3.65m and eaves height of 3.65m)
decision_conditions: The enlarged part of the dwellinghouse would be within 2 metres of the boundary of the curtilage of the dwellinghouse and the height of the eaves of the enlarged part would exceed 3 metres, in conflict with Paragraph A.1 (i) of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (as amended).

The assessment of this application is been based on measurements taken from the submitted drawings / plans. If it transpires that the drawings / plans submitted are incorrect this would nullify the validity of this decision and you are advised to submit a fresh application with the correct information / drawings.

Please provide revised copy of block plan scaled 1:500 showing the proposed works (hatched or shaded) in relation to the existing dwelling, site boundaries and any outbuildings on site.  The block plan should also show adjoining properties to the side and rear and those opposite in full outline.Please include the dimensions of the proposed extension to the vehicle crossover.
